name: Malcolm & Marie
description: Malcolm & Marie is a movie starring John David Washington and Zendaya. A director and his girlfriend's relationship is tested after they return home from his movie premiere and face each other's turmoil during one long night.
keywords: two hander,minimal cast,reference to barry jenkins,reference to william wyler,reference to the los angeles times

review.name: Exhausting to watch but good!
review.reviewBody:
I'm glad I watched this film in my living room with the volume low and not at the cinema.

The dialogues were a bit on and off to me. It was a bit hard to keep up at times with all the shouting and swearing. Sometimes a bit too scholar on Marie's side, like she was reading her lines.

That said, I think the acting was really good. Enough to keep me captivated during the whole time. It felt authentic.

The aesthetic in general was raw and really beautiful.

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: When filmmaker Malcolm (John David Washington) and his girlfriend Marie (Zendaya), return home from a movie premiere and await his film's critical response, the evening takes a turn as revelations about their relationship surface, testing the couple's love.

Filming Locations: Feldman Architecture's Caterpillar House - Carmel, California, USA
